attributes.action: Reduce foreing aid and increase defence, health and education
attributes.additional_details: I believe that the money set aside for foreing aid should be reduced by 60%. The money saved should then be equally distrubuted beween the armed services, NHS and education. Billions are being sent to corupt goverments or to countries that don't require it, take Indina for example they have their own space program yet the UK goverment hands them £280 million! This is a shocking waste of the British peoples money
